name: rick-morty-pwa-workbox
description: Demo on how to do a PWA with workbox step by step.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sass && npm run copy
scripts.sass: npm run clean:css && npx sass src/scss:dist/csss --no-source-map
scripts.sass:w: npm run clean:css && npx sass src/scss:dist/css --no-source-map --watch
